Original: You will accept this request? The
client is an explorer, like you. She
would like you to find a lost item.
[Page]
A bear attacked while she explored
[Color:5]B3F[Color:0] of the [Color:5]Lush Woodlands[Color:0], and she
lost her mother's ring in a [Color:5]spring[Color:0].
[Page]
She barely escaped with her life and
is in no condition to go retrieve the
ring. You must go in her place.
[Page]
Kismet be with you, and I shall await
your swift return.
Translation: You will accept this request? The
client is an explorer, like you. She
would like you to find a lost item.
[Page]
A bear attacked while she explored
[Color:5]B3F[Color:0] of the [Color:5]Lush Woodlands[Color:0], and she
lost her mother's ring in a [Color:5]spring[Color:0].
[Page]
She barely escaped with her life and
is in no condition to go retrieve the
ring. You must go in her place.
[Page]
Kismet be with you, and I shall await
your swift return.

Original: Welcome back. It seems to me that you
found success in retrieving the ring.
[Page]
I shall take the responsibility of
returning the ring to the client.
I hope that she recovers soon...
[Page]
I again thank you for your hard work.
I shall have more for you in the
future, [Guild] Guild.
Translation: Welcome back. It seems to me that you
found success in retrieving the ring.
[Page]
I shall take the responsibility of
returning the ring to the client.
I hope that she recovers soon...
[Page]
I again thank you for your hard work.
I shall have more for you in the
future, [Guild] Guild.

Original: You peer into the spring, in order to
fulfill the terms of the request...
[Page]
But you see nothing.
Translation: You peer into the spring, in order to
fulfill the terms of the request...
[Page]
But you see nothing.

Original: You peer into the spring, in order to
fulfill the terms of the request...
[Page]
What you find is a medicine bottle,
most likely dropped by another
explorer. You pick it up.
[Page]
But this quest's objective was not a
medicine bottle, and so you continue
toward the other springs.
Translation: You peer into the spring, in order to
fulfill the terms of the request...
[Page]
What you find is a medicine bottle,
most likely dropped by another
explorer. You pick it up.
[Page]
But this quest's objective was not a
medicine bottle, and so you continue
toward the other springs.

Original: You peer into the spring, in order to
fulfill the terms of the request...
[Page]
Suddenly, you see a light glinting
from something at the bottom of the
spring!
[Page]
You reach in and take out a crystal,
which will be useful as raw material.
[Page]
But this quest's objective was not a
crystal, and so you continue toward
the other springs.
Translation: You peer into the spring, in order to
fulfill the terms of the request...
[Page]
Suddenly, you see a light glinting
from something at the bottom of the
spring!
[Page]
You reach in and take out a crystal,
which will be useful as raw material.
[Page]
But this quest's objective was not a
crystal, and so you continue toward
the other springs.

Original: You peer into the spring, in order to
fulfill the terms of the request...
[Page]
Suddenly, [Character:0] cries out as you
hear a loud splash!
[Page]
Your party looks around and sees that
[Character:0] has slipped and fallen
into the spring.
Translation: You peer into the spring, in order to
fulfill the terms of the request...
[Page]
Suddenly, [Character:0] cries out as you
hear a loud splash!
[Page]
Your party looks around and sees that
[Character:0] has slipped and fallen
into the spring.

Original: [Color:3][Character:0] loses 15 HP.[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3][Character:0] loses 15 HP.[Color:0]

Original: You peer into the spring, in order to
fulfill the terms of the request...
[Page]
You notice something stuck at the
bottom of the spring, hidden in the
shadow of the rocks.
[Page]
The party tries to determine what it
is, but cannot no matter what angle
you look at it from.
[Page]
With everyone so intent on the object
in the spring, you fail to notice
monsters approaching from behind!
Translation: You peer into the spring, in order to
fulfill the terms of the request...
[Page]
You notice something stuck at the
bottom of the spring, hidden in the
shadow of the rocks.
[Page]
The party tries to determine what it
is, but cannot no matter what angle
you look at it from.
[Page]
With everyone so intent on the object
in the spring, you fail to notice
monsters approaching from behind!

Original: After dealing with the monsters, you
quickly reach into the spring and grab
the stuck object.
[Page]
It is revealed as a medicine bottle,
most likely dropped by another
explorer.
[Page]
But this quest's objective was not a
medicine bottle, and so you continue
toward the other springs.
Translation: After dealing with the monsters, you
quickly reach into the spring and grab
the stuck object.
[Page]
It is revealed as a medicine bottle,
most likely dropped by another
explorer.
[Page]
But this quest's objective was not a
medicine bottle, and so you continue
toward the other springs.

Original: You peer into the spring, in order to
fulfill the terms of the request...
[Page]
Suddenly, you see a light glinting
from something at the bottom of the
spring!
[Page]
It seems to be the ring! The party
gives a collective cheer as you fish
it out from the spring.
[Page]
The ring that shines in the palm of
your hand must be the client's... You
need only take it back to her now.
[Page]
Feeling accomplished, you head back
to the bar in order to make your
report.
Translation: You peer into the spring, in order to
fulfill the terms of the request...
[Page]
Suddenly, you see a light glinting
from something at the bottom of the
spring!
[Page]
It seems to be the ring! The party
gives a collective cheer as you fish
it out from the spring.
[Page]
The ring that shines in the palm of
your hand must be the client's... You
need only take it back to her now.
[Page]
Feeling accomplished, you head back
to the bar in order to make your
report.

Original: After the party fishes the poor
[Character:0] out, you decide to move
on to the other springs.
Translation: After the party fishes the poor
[Character:0] out, you decide to move
on to the other springs.
